name: Honey Kiwi
description:
Full Notes here:
https://diyordievaping.com/2020/06/03/honey-kiwi-diy-e-liquid-recipe/

This mashes up the tropical flavors of cantaloupe & kiwi, and pours sweet honey on top. The result is absolute deliciousness. Made on Live Mixing.
author: ENYAWREKLAW

reviews.text: So glad I got the flavors for this and mixed it up. Such an interesting profile. My new ADV!

As stated in previous review this is an excellent sweet, smooth, tropical vape that I am yet to tire of. I dont know how much I get straight honey from vt honeycomb but it is delicious nonetheless, excellent work will be mixing again!
Tropical, Smooth, sweet, a bangin ADV for sure. Thanks for this.
